subject: RE: Analytics Endpoints - Auth Added, On TEST
body:
Gotan,

Following up on your GDPR audit. Progress update:

## COMPLETED

✅ All 5 analytics endpoints now require function key auth:
- Analytics_LoginHistory
- Analytics_VisitorHistory
- Analytics_VisitorHeatmap
- Analytics_MapCenterHistory
- Analytics_OrganizerActivity

Changed `authLevel: 'anonymous'` → `authLevel: 'function'`

Commit: 7e6ddc70
Branches: DEVL ✅, TEST ✅, PROD pending

## PENDING

⏳ **PII in logs** - Ybotman says hold on this. Working through masking approach for future RU (Read User) role that will see masked IPs.

⏳ **PROD deployment** - Waiting for Dash to update CalOps with function key, then will deploy.

## BLOCKED BY

- Dash: CalOps needs to add `x-functions-key` header to API calls
- Sent MSG to Dash with instructions

## SA Key Distribution

- Currently only 'default' key exists in Azure
- Only Ybotman has access (Azure Portal)
- CalOps will be first consumer

— Fulton
